public class Clear extends ClickableTool implements CanvasObserver
Clear Tool is used to clear everything in the canvas

  • Constructor Details

    • Clear

      public Clear(LayerObserver layerObserver, OurCanvas canvas, UndoTool undo)
      Clear Tool is used to clear everything in the canvas
      Parameters:
      layerObserver - a layerObserver is an object that observers changes that happens to the layers structure
      canvas - is the current canvas that holds all the layers
      undo - is the tool that manages how the undo and redo works
